magpie.optimization.rankers

Class CompositionDistanceRanker

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.optimization.rankers.BaseEntryRanker
      • magpie.optimization.rankers.CompositionDistanceRanker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Options

    public class CompositionDistanceRanker
extends BaseEntryRanker
    Rank entries based on distance from compositions in a user-provided dataset. Use this if, for instance, you are interested in materials not included in a training set.

    Usage: $<dataset> <norm> <threshold>
    dataset: CompositionDataset containing all compositions being considered
    norm: Which p norm to use when computing distances. Use -1 for the Linf norm.

    See Also:
    CompositionSetDistanceFilter
